A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Easily the worst Starwars film of the whole bunch and that's saying something...
In fact it's not just the worst Starwars film I have seen it's the worst film I have ever seen\, 
They have completely destroyed all the male characters making them all without exception seem either childish\, pouty or downright stupid\,
while at the same time making most of the female characters wise\, intelligent and superior.
The film plot has so many holes in it and has lots of irrelevant scenes in it\, The director has shown a complete misunderstanding of the starwars universe and I feel has damaged this franchise beyond repair... The force is pathetic with this one
